A paragraph before nested structures that is long enough to need rewrapping to fit within sixty characters.

> Blockquote with a very long line that should be preserved verbatim without any rewrapping.
>
> > Nested blockquote that should also be preserved as-is.

- List item one
  - Nested list item that is long enough to potentially cause issues with the wrapper
    - Deeply nested item

1. Ordered item
   1. Nested ordered item that is quite long and should not be touched by the wrapper

A paragraph between structures that is long enough to need rewrapping to fit within the column width.

> > Double-nested blockquote directly without an outer blockquote wrapper.

Final paragraph that is long enough to need rewrapping to fit within sixty characters for testing.
